name: 104th Training Corps
description: Elite soldiers training to fight Titans and master ODM gear

name: Scout Regiment
description: The Scout Regiment is the military's main expeditionary force, responsible for exploring the world outside the walls and fighting against the Titans.

name: Garrison Regiment
description: The Garrison Regiment is responsible for defending the walls and maintaining order within the walls.

name: Military Police Regiment
description: The Military Police Regiment is responsible for maintaining order within the walls and protecting the royal family.

name: Mentors
description: The Mentors are responsible for mentoring the students and helping them learn.
